text: Seraphin R. Léger (August 28, 1870 – May 15, 1935) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Liberal party representing Gloucester County from 1917 to 1935. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1870 births Category:1935 deaths Category:New Brunswick Liberal Association MLAs
title: Seraphin R. Léger
